title: [CRASH] SIGSEGV in addReplySubcommandSyntaxError at networking.c:966
body:


**Additional information**

1. OS distribution and version
   unstable branch,  commit #5460c10  (2022-1-3)
2. Steps to reproduce (if any)

(a) Download the latest code and compile
(b) Run  ./redis-server in one console
(c) Download the input file:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zyingp/temp/master/redis/crash_addReplySubcommandSyntaxError
(d) Open another console and run  nc with the input file like:
nc 127.0.0.1 6379 < "./crash_addReplySubcommandSyntaxError"
(e) The server crashes.
